newFeatures.title: [Due Date 10 Feb] HSA: Customer Loyalty Dashboard Redesign
newFeatures.plan: Shopify & Salla: Pro / GURU Â· Selfserve: Growth / Enterprise
newFeatures.description:
As a store owner using Gameball
I want a redesigned loyalty dashboard
So that I can easily view and manage my customers' loyalty status and rewards.

Currently, the dashboard is cluttered and hard to navigate. This enhancement will provide a cleaner, more intuitive interface with better data visualization.

capabilities.title: Acceptance Criteria
items: Dashboard displays customer count, points distributed, and redemption rates
Charts are responsive and load within 2 seconds
Export functionality works for all data views

improvements.title: [HSA] Performance Optimization for Points Calculation
improvements.overview:
As a developer
I want faster points calculation
So that customers don't experience delays when earning points.

whatsNew.title: Technical Implementation
whatsNew.description: Optimized database queries and added caching layer
